name: CAVE (Explore the CAVE)
description:
HEY!!

I made another platformer Game!

This is about the CUBE Exploring the CAVE

and I made this game in just 2 Days!!

WoW

This game has some Cool Musics, Nice Arts, Fun Facts and More!!

And I actually made this Just for fun!

Movement: A and D or Right and Left arrow key

Jump is SpaceBar

Fly Movement: Click the Cube or Player and Drag it

Feel free to play this game and Comment your feedback if you want!

You can also Donate some few dollars if you like this game and want me to do some more games like this.

THAT'S ALL!

THANKS AND HAVE A VERY NICE DAY!!!

:D
